sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Swimming Pool Safety Act.

sections.heading: No person shall prohibit the use of a life jacket in a
sections.text:
swimming pool by any individual who, as evidenced by a statement signed by
a licensed physician, suffers from a physical disability or condition which
necessitates the use of such life jacket.

sections.heading: Any individual who establishes a policy in violation of this
sections.text:
Act, or who violates this Act while acting contrary to an established
policy which is in compliance with this Act, is guilty of a petty offense
and shall be subject to a fine of not more than $100 for each violation.
